short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize and extract audio files, webpages, Youtube videos, and more with AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ParsePrompt makes it easy to send audio files, images, Youtube videos, PDFs, and web-pages into an AI prompt. Integrated with the best AI models like OpenAI and Anthropic!

Create a prompt template based on a business process, then use the chrome extension to push audio files, videos, web-pages, and PDFs. ParsePrompt will convert the media asset, and then you can run an AI prompt against it. You can format the output into text, json, or markdown. We even have a Zapier integration so you can send the output to over 6,000 software apps.

Summarize a website or a youtube video, extract key themes from a web-page, tag images, or generate a blog post from a PDF. It's all possible with ParsePrompt!

Say hello to multi-modal AI.
